p:
Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss Territory of Washington Plaintiff vs. Wilson D. Coyle Defendant} In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, hold- ing terms at Cheney, Spo- kane County, in said Territory
To the Sheriff of Spokane County, Greeting: In the name of the United States, You are hereby commanded to summon M.E. R.C. Richardson and John Crane to be and appear before the District Court aforesaid at the Court House, in Cheney, in said County, on the forthwith day of April A.D. 188, at o'clock M. to there give evi- dence in the above entitled cause on the part of said defendant.
Witness the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the seal thereof affixed, this 1 day of May A.D. 1885. Kate W. Feauerbach Clerk By R. Strobach Deputy.
